import React from 'react'; import {Grid, Dropdown, Button, Menu, Divider, Image} from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class NavbarMenu extends React.Component { state = { activeItem: 'home' } handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name }) render(){ const { activeItem } = this.state return(
) } }
